Changelog:
Build 2024.9.2.680
- Improved WndProc.SendToGameOnly() behaviour.
- Improved input sending for GameBinds.

Build 2024.9.1.1402
- Fixed M and N being swapped in the GameBinds.
- Always pass the cursor position through to the game even when hovering Nexus UI.
- Fixed input sending for GameBinds.

Build 2024.8.28.1286
- Fixed a case in which some addons would not receive their Unload call on game close.
- Fixed duplicate addon config entries not being handled properly.
- Fixed the extended key check which broke some game bind modifiers such as Shift.
- Changed GameBind.InvokeAsync() function to restore the modifier state after execution.
- Fixed Fonts.Get() merely sending the font to the receiver, instead of also subscribing it to changes.
- Fixed staged textures that are still loading data asynchronously from being ignored during the ::Verify() call.
- Changed the behaviour of the cursor position for Nexus. Previously if the cursor was not hovering over Nexus UI it would be sent to Narnia, now it simply isn't updated.
- Changed the behaviour when a texture load fails. If at any point during staging, queue or creation the texture fails, a nullptr will be sent to the receiver.

Build 2024.8.1.1295
- Added conditional visibility settings for Quick Access to replicate the game's options.
- Changed addons window update check to disregard 30 minute cache and instead use a shorter 5 minute cache.
- Fixed a crash/hang on shutdown.
- Major internal changes regarding input handling.
- Added support for modifiers (Alt, Ctrl, Shift) to be standalone Input Binds.
- Fixed font merging for character ranges such as Chinese and Cyrillic.
- Fixed font migration not selecting a font in the new runtime fonts system.
- Changed character ranges to be loaded on demand when using the Localization API. If your addon wants to use non-latin characters, make sure to at least push the characters using Localization.Set().
- Fixed orphaned Quick Access Context Items not being removed properly.
- Added support for mouse buttons to be used for Input Binds and Game Binds.

Build 2024.7.29.875
- Added option to change fonts at runtime. Fonts will be loaded from "<GW2>/addons/Nexus/Fonts"
- Added compatibility with RTSS and other problematic overlays.
- Changed DLL proxying internals.
- Fixed ReadOnly behaviour of Debug Tools.
